title: Schema for 5W1H and Guesses
description: Defines the object structure for describing the 5W1H (What, When, Where, Why, Who, How) and two guesses (superficial, deep).

lang.description: The language to be used in the response. should be formal form, like `English`

actions.description: Actions list to do next. Scheduler starts execution of these action in order

name.description: Name of the actor or command. if name is command, other fields are ignored

prompt.description: What action the actor should do

concurrent.description: Actor can concurrently act with other action. If this is false, actor will block until it completed

inherit_history.description: inherit previous action history if in sequential. If previous action's concurrent field is true, this is simply ignored
